metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10134 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: SQL injection vulnerability in Zabbix before 2.2.14 and 3.0 before 3.0.4 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the toggle_ids array parameter in latest.php. It was discovered that Zabbix incorrectly handled certain inputs. A remote attacker could posibly use this issue to execute arbitrary SQL commands.

criterions.comment: zabbix: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
